website_summaries.verdict: Quality lip liner with nice color and a built-in lid sharpener that may result in product wasting if you don't use it correctly.
pros: Waterproof formula that goes on smoothly
Tip provides a precise line every time
Not prone to fading or feathering
Natural-looking color stays true and has rich pigmentation
cons: The unique sharpener inside the lid is handy, but is a bit awkward to  learn how to use
If the tip is too sharp, it tends to break off

customer_reviews.title: Great for Some Things...Not for Crisp Lines
customer_reviews.text: This clear lip liner is awesome. It's 100% clear and keeps my lipstick in place. The one thing it can't do, of course, is create nice sharp edges or enhance lip shape, due to being totally clear. I bought this because I didn't want to have to buy a gazillion different lip liners to match each of my lipsticks - and because I find it tough to match liner and lipstick colors. It helps a little with that and works well in other ways, but I'll be going back to colored liners after this one because I like the look of cleaner lines.
